body:
It's been a while and I feel like answering questions.

Not gonna respond to 'opinion on me' posts..they're on every AMA xD
body_tagged:

title: Q&A SnowSX3

replies.body: What is your opinion on teamspeak right now?
replies.body_tagged: What is your opinion on teamspeak right now?

replies.body: Opinions on that cool admin called Posighdun?
replies.body_tagged: Opinions on that cool admin called Posighdun?

replies.body: Reasons for why the nerd above me should be demoted? :P
replies.body_tagged: Reasons for why the nerd above me should be demoted? :P

replies.body: Why haven't you been mini modding on the forums lately?
replies.body_tagged: Why haven't you been mini modding on the forums lately?

replies.body:
What is your opinion on teamspeak right now?
The majority is fine atm, but I've always hated the 18+ channels.
Especisally these Nightclub channels, purely because the things that you aren't allowed to do are so specific, they don't cover all areas of vulgarity. IMO the Nightclub rules need to be fully revamped.
Opinions on Zac
When he's mature I can have a somewhat decent conversation with him.
But he's immature as fuck so it's funny to see all of his predictable comments he posts when he starts replying/flaming with me.
But I have nothing against him personally...because I don't know him personally xD

Opinions on that 'cool' admin called Posighdun?
Avicus is dead. Posighdun's an Admin. Let the shit spelling and terrible jokes rule the land.
jkjk
Posighdun's a great guy and I know anyone who will do a good job at this it's him.
The fact that sess and hoops are on the same page and are actually willing to do good for this server is really cool.
Also, sessp didn't change into a dick once he got Admin.. Thank God xD

Reasons for why the Posighdun should be demoted? :P
He's Australian.
Like, what else do you need?

Why haven't you been mini modding on the forums lately?
Because fuck you that's why.

Favourite Car?
One person you would like to meet on Avicus IRL? (including petlas ;) )

replies.body:
Snow! Oh it's been such a long time, I remember working as moderators side-by-side and you'd always be the fasted to type /s on, argh that was a pain; I'll have you know I created a chat macro for that so nobody can beat me, only now it's a bit useless. :P

  1. What was the last picture you took with your phone?
  2. If you could have personally witnessed anything, what would you want to have seen?
  3. If you could be any age for a week, what age would that be?
  4. What 5 words would a close friend use to describe you?
  5. What have you always wanted? Did you ever get it?
  6. What is your favourite month of the year?
  7. What was your first impression of me?
  8. What's the best compliment you have received?
Not sure if you in school or not currently, but anyway have a good one! :D

Take it easy, - Aura

replies.body:
Yo Jack! It's been a while, hopefully we can talk more often soon :)

  1. What was the last picture you took with your phone?
    Umm I put it on Snapchat, add me lol
  2. If you could have personally witnessed anything, what would you want to have seen?
    I have no idea... umm Angelico, Son of Havoc and Ivelisse winning the trios championship on Lucha Underground.
    Would have been so cool to see that live..I'm such a wrestling dork xD
  3. If you could be any age for a week, what age would that be?
    I'd be 14 again to take advantage of opportunities that I didn't know were available to me at the time. (School related am boring)
  4. What 5 words would a close friend use to describe you?
    Funny, Trustworthy, Loyal, Respectful, Stupid xD
  5. What have you always wanted? Did you ever get it?
    Senior Moderator. Not yet.
  6. What is your favourite month of the year?
    December, Christmas+Holidays+Family.
  7. What was your first impression of me?
    I can't remember tbh xD But as I got to know you better as a person and as a friend it became clear to me that you are a really cool person who I am glad to call my friend.
  8. What's the best compliment you have received?
    Umm idk, whenever someone laughs at my jokes, knowing that I've made them happy is always a good compliment.

    :D
